title: When Large Language Models Do Not Work: Online Incivility Prediction through Graph Neural Networks
summary: Online incivility has emerged as a widespread and persistent problem in digital communities, imposing substantial social and psychological burdens on users. Although many platforms attempt to curb incivility through moderation and automated detection, the performance of existing approaches often remains limited in both accuracy and efficiency.
